sentences.english: I am fascinated to see all the varied approaches to making with clay.
sentences.chinese: 我陶醉於陶藝家們運用各種方法進行陶泥創作。

sentences.english: And the Ancient Nanfeng Klin is the symbol of fine art.
sentences.chinese: 而南風古竈正是集陶藝之精華的地方。

sentences.english: As the synthesis of art and science, the process of pottery art creating is complex.
sentences.chinese: 陶藝製作過程程序多且複雜，是藝術和科學的綜合體。

sentences.english: The first impression of the Fuping Pottery Art Village was overwhelming.
sentences.chinese: 富平陶藝村給我的第一印象是十分深刻的。

sentences.english: Or, if you enjoy pottery, showcase your creations in your apartment.
sentences.chinese: 或者，要是你喜歡陶藝，就在房間裏擺上你的作品。

sentences.english: Professor of the High School of Ceramic since 1968.1985-1987.
sentences.chinese: 從1968年開始任陶藝學校的老師。

sentences.english: This is the reason why FPAV decided to establish ceramic art galleries.
sentences.chinese: 因此，富平陶藝村決心要開設陶藝畫廊。

sentences.english: This is the reason why FPAV decided to establish ceramic art galleries.
sentences.chinese: 因此，富平陶藝村決心要開設陶藝畫廊。

sentences.english: Emotion is an important modern pottery decorative wall element.
sentences.chinese: 情感是現代陶藝壁飾的重要構成要素。

sentences.english: The third part is the application of the in pottery.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是泥板成型工藝在陶藝創作中的應用。

sentences.english: Work entered The 8th International Ceramics Competition Mino, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 作品入選第八屆日本美濃國際陶藝展。

sentences.english: Having travelled from a big city it felt like a very familial experience when I arrived at Fuping Pottery Village.
sentences.chinese: 從大城市來到富平陶藝村，讓我有一種家的感覺。

sentences.english: Later, ceramists developed the method of "throwing" clay on a wheel.
sentences.chinese: 後來，陶藝發展的“扔”車輪上的粘土的方法。

sentences.english: In 1965, he graduates in the High School of Ceramic, Faculty of Arts-(National University of Cuyo)-Mendoza, Argentina.
sentences.chinese: 1965年他畢業於阿根廷門多薩藝術學院陶藝學校。

sentences.english: Obtained a Higher Certificate in Studio Ceramics from the former Hong Kong Polytechnic in 1991.
sentences.chinese: 1991年修畢前理工學院高級陶藝證書課程。

sentences.english: There is also a good team spirit between the members of the Irish group.
sentences.chinese: 愛爾蘭陶藝家之間具有非常良好的團隊精神。

definition: papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
